task.title: Client certificate authentication
task.shortdesc: A server certificate must be manually installed on each client on which an SSL connection to the server is be established.

step.cmd: Type an the following in the URL bar:https://ipaddress:port_number and press Enter.
step.info:
Where: ipaddress The IP Address where the endpoint is configured where the clients are going to connect.
port_number The endpoint port.
A warning is displayed saying that the certificate is not trusted.

step.cmd: Follow the prompts on the warning to accept the certificate.
